elated-tan-skat.description: The Europa Hub is a SKALE Chain that offers a number of benefits to the SKALE ecosystem. It’s primary purpose is to offer projects building in the Decentralized Finance space to have a place to utilize shared compute within the SKALE Network.

ruby-exchange.description: Ruby.Exchange is the leading AMM on the SKALE Network - a hybrid L1/L2 solution for Ethereum that offers unlimited scalability with zero gas fees, fast confirmation times, free and instant transfers between SKALE Chains via Metaport, and front-running protection at the network level.

rehold.description: One-stop decentralized app to buy, swap, earn, or trade your crypto with up to 100x leverage and AI assistance.

adorable-quaint-bellatrix.description: StreamMyScreen is the easiest and most affordable way to go live on all your channels at the same time with multicast live streaming.

affectionate-immediate-pollux.description: CryptoBlades is a play-to-earn NFT blockchain game on 8 Chains, including SKALE!

portly-passionate-sirius.description: Solydaria is the new way for direct, fair exchanges of value between customers and creators.

round-hasty-alsafi.description: DEXGame is designed to bring together the core components of the game ecosystem's value chain on its metaverse platform

haunting-devoted-deneb.description: Crypto Colosseum is a suite of strategy based blockchain games live on SKALE.

frayed-decent-antares.description: Block Brawlers is a play-to-earn game powered by SKALE and GameCredits

honorable-steel-rasalhague.description: The Calypso Hub is a SKALE Chain focusing on innovation within the Web3 space. Home to a variety of projects in various industries, Calypso is the defacto location for projects looking to push the boundaries in Web3.

untitled-platformer.description: Welcome to the competitive world of Untitled. A retro multiplayer platformer that offers players the ability to either sabotage or befriend other players while exploring dynamic 2D worlds. Untitled has been designed with the primary goal of allowing gamers to hop on and off whenever they feel like it.

clet-name-service.description: Clet is a decentralised web3 name service and a universal profile solution that allows users to link their various crypto addresses, as well as all other essential details that sums up an identity to a single human-readable name.

collab-land.description: Get A Name For Your Crypto Addresses Now

tank-wars-zone.description: Design your own 3D Tank Model and sell it in our game marketplace. Everyone can buy or trade these tanks and play them in all gameplay modes.

pixudi.description: Pixudi is a race board game built on the blockchain technology. Players compete with each other to collect more treasures than others by overcoming obstacles that come their way and completing missions.

dmail.description: Dmail Network is an AI-powered decentralized communication infrastructure built to provide encrypted emails, unified notifications, and targeted marketing across multiple chains and dApps for users, developers, marketers and influencers.

dripverse.description: Modular Digital Assets Ecosystem. An Omnichain NFT Infrastructure & scaling solutions for builders and creators!

hurley.description: Surf the wave of Web3 with Hurley, the iconic surf brand out of Southern California, with exclusive Hurley Digital Collectible NFTs!

solo-network.description: Welcome to SOLO: Your Gateway to the Future of Learning and Employment.

plain-rotanev.description: You haven’t seen NFTs & Crypto delivered like this.

parallel-stormy-spica.description: The Titan Hub is a SKALE chain dedicated to AI and ML apps looking to utilize blockchain. With all of the existing benefits of a SKALE Chain plus a dedicated place for AI projects to deploy, this hub is here for projects pushing the boundaries of the intersection between AI + Web3.

chaingpt.description: Unleash the power of Blockchain AI with ChainGPT. An advanced AI model explicitly designed for Blockchain Technology and Crypto-related topics. It uses the latest algorithms and high-speed computing capabilities to address challenging issues in the Blockchain and Crypto space. Using ChainGPT, users may quickly obtain whatever knowledge and information they require. With many other unique features designed for individuals, developers, and businesses, ChainGPT is an essential tool for all in the Blockchain space.

palm-ai.description: Multi-platform PaLM AI chatbot uses @Google AI tech for conversations, coding, and image generation, focusing on accessible AI and revenue sharing.

sirkl.description: SIRKL is the first messaging app with a crypto wallet identification. Talk to wallets, friends, NFT communities, and more using only your wallet as a login!

skillful-ai.description: Building a Personalized AI Ecosystem powered by Web3

light-vast-diphda.description: Exorde is the web3 protocol that empowers developers to crawl and link all public data on the web

green-giddy-denebola.description: The Nebula Hub is a SKALE Chain focused on supporting the fast-growing gaming ecosystem. With SKALE’s Zero Gas Fees, the Nebula Gaming Hub enables projects deployed on other EVM (Ethereum Virtual Machine) based chains to quickly and easily migrate to a zero-cost gas environment, opening up the door to invisible gaming experiences for their existing communities.

motodex.description: MotoDEX is a NFT game, competition of multi-level racing on motorcycles on high-speed tracks with unlimited opportunities for players.

fivetars.description: Predict games and build your dream team in our free Web3 football game. Compete against fans worldwide for an immersive and engaging experience!

bit-hotel.description: Bit Hotel is a Social Play and Earn Game, in which users are able to use Bit Hotel tokens to acquire native items and participate in all kinds of in-game competitions and events. The item NFTs have in-game usability and consist of characters, hotel rooms, furniture and other artifacts that have their own perks. They consist of varying rarities and can be traded on the open market.

jump-trade.description: Jump.trade, a premium NFT marketplace, brings exclusive NFT collections in a one-of-a-kind ecosystem featuring game, brands and international artists.

dex-go.description: What is a DexGO? This is an NFT game with elements of augmented reality.

heavens-compass.description: In the heart-pounding world of Haven's Compass, players step into the boots of an operative of their choice in a dystopian future, where they are tasked with unraveling a conspiracy that threatens to plunge the world into chaos.

ballers-city.description: Ballers Studio is a web3 gaming infrastructure, a one stop shop for the community that loves games, parties, rewards, and unlimited fun! Ballers Studio is coming up with multiple hypercasual and competitive FREE-to-play games, a pop-style NFT collection inspired by OG influencers and personalities, and endless raffles and referral campaigns.

booja-world.description: Dive into a world of endless entertainment with our collection of casual blockchain games, powered by the cutting-edge SKALE Network technology. Experience seamless gameplay, trade assets securely, and earn rewards as you play. Join the revolution where fun meets blockchain innovation!

chainguardians.description: Welcome to ChainGuardians, a player-driven platform revolutionizing the gaming world! By combining traditional gaming concepts with emerging technologies, we've created an ecosystem where players can earn rewards through our free-to-play digital asset mining platform and Role-Playing Game. But we don't stop there - we're constantly forming partnerships and working collaboratively to smash through ideological barriers oppressing user ownership and digital economies.

gamifly.description: Gamifly is a fully transparent sports metaverse that provides esports events for fans and gamers alike.

hatchyverse.description: Embark on a collector's journey with HATCHY, shaping the brand's destiny. Build a remarkable collection of unique treasures, elevating the brand's value.

heroes-battle-arena.description: Welcome to play-to-earn strategic NFT game. A free, play&fun multichain game inspired by the legendary 'Heroes Might and Magic'.

interverse.description: JOIN EPIC BATTLES AND CLAIM VICTORY

mystrios.description: Immerse yourself in the world of Mystrios for an unprecedented Play-to-Earn experience, now live on SKALE. Unparalleled gaming begins here.

spells-of-genesis.description: Spells of Genesis (SoG) is the 1st blockchain-based mobile game ever made.

sport-z-chain.description: The first Engage-To-Earn (E2E) platform for sports fans powered by $SPN. We are building a digital world for fans by offering Sports Tokens.

star-z-play.description: Predict games and build your dream team in our free Web3 football game. Compete against fans worldwide for an immersive and engaging experience.

world-of-dypians.description: Experience unique gameplay and explore a world without end in a quest to form your destiny.

yomi-games.description: Yomi Block Puzzle is your classic block puzzle game, free to play, and has several original features including a lovable pet that reacts as you score combos!

zeus.description: Ether Strike is a first person shooter launched by Zeus that places the player in the perspective of a character who is armed with more than 20 variations of weapons and must engage in combat with enemies.

omniaverse.description: Explore your distinct gamer profile and monitor your gaming stats effortlessly in one place.

earnscape.description: While you play, you earn rewards. It's that simple. Every game on your phone is compatible.

starwolvez.description: The gasless Web3 base building game with over 1 million compatible NFTs. Build your base and raid others.

hangry-animals.description: Hangry Animals is a comprehensive ecosystem that blends gaming with charity, where players engage in quests and level completions to support animal welfare.

floki-cyber-punk.description: Floki Cyber Punk is a multiplayer game that invites players to dive into online battles in a vibrant and engaging world where players can fight, earn, and grow within a dynamic digital ecosystem.

space-rush-odyssey.description: Embark on an exhilarating journey with Xurono in Astro Assault as part of Space Rush Odyssey! Dive into the depths of space in this thrilling bullet hell adventure, where you'll seek the elusive Azul Fragment. Face off against waves of formidable foes in intense battles, armed with powerful weapons. Navigate treacherous obstacles and collect valuable loot to enhance your arsenal. But the challenges don't end there—immerse yourself in the rich lore, working alongside Winston and Artemis to unravel the ancient Smercin mystery. Delve into the secrets of the lost ritual to summon unknown powers

katana-inu.description: A blockchain-based PC game set in a vibrant, fast-paced universe of sword and spell combat.

wan-red-ain.description: HUMAN Protocol enables collaboration at a global scale. Anyone can pay millions of people to complete work on-chain

curly-red-alterf.description: Fireside is the first streaming platform that invites audiences not to just view content, but participate in it

fussy-smoggy-megrez.description: StrayShot is a thrilling third-person Shooter Game where you step into the boots of a Bounty Hunter, ready to take on rivals in intense matches.
